alert.note: Alert for Northwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 10:56AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Suffolk County through 1130 AM EDT... At 1055 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stony Brook, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Centereach, Stony Brook, Port Jefferson, Rocky Point, Mount Sinai, Selden, Setauket, St. James, Miller Place, Lake Grove, Port Jefferson Station, Sound Beach, Nissequogue, Head Of The Harbor and Poquott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
